title: Complimentary Recycling Strengthens Circular Plastics Economy - PlasticsToday
summary: The article discusses the global issue of plastic waste, emphasizing the need for increased plastics recycling through advanced technologies and collaboration across sectors to achieve a circular economy.
green_innovation: TRUE. The article addresses the environmental risks of plastic waste and promotes sustainable solutions like advanced recycling technologies and government actions, contributing to environmental sustainability goals.
business_innovation: FALSE. The article focuses on recycling solutions for plastic waste rather than introducing new or significantly improved products or business processes.
green_product: TRUE. The article highlights the importance of green products by discussing sustainable packaging, recycling processes, and the need for a circular economy to reduce environmental impacts.
green_process: TRUE. The article emphasizes the importance of green processes in recycling technologies, such as pyrolysis and chemical recycling, to minimize environmental impacts and promote sustainability.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 325211 - Plastics Material and Resin Manufacturing, 562920 - Materials Recovery Facilities, 562998 - All Other Miscellaneous Waste Management Services, 333249 - Other Industrial Machinery Manufacturing
greenwashing: FALSE. The article does not exhibit greenwashing as it focuses on genuine efforts and advancements in plastics recycling to address environmental concerns.

title: Recycle Track Systems announces acquisition of Cycle Technology - PR Newswire
summary: Recycle Track Systems, Inc. acquires Cycle Technology, including reverse vending machine technology, to expand recycling through engagement programs with sports teams. RTS provides waste management solutions to professional teams, promoting sustainability and achieving zero landfill status at venues like Subaru Park.
